conversation.message: Hello Parent D, thank you for reaching out! We take great pride in our individualized learning approach. Our daily schedule is structured yet highly adaptable; while core activities like literacy and numeracy happen consistently, the timing and depth are tailored based on observation and the specific developmental goals of each child. Regarding outdoor time, we view it as integral, not supplementary. We ensure substantial outdoor exploration time, typically incorporating two dedicated periods daily—one morning session and one afternoon session—totaling at least 90 minutes, weather permitting. We use our outdoor space for nature studies and gross motor skill development. conversation.message: That is a critical question, Parent D, and thank you for raising it. Effective assessment is the backbone of our individualized approach. We prioritize authentic, ongoing assessment over standardized testing. Specifically, we utilize detailed anecdotal observation notes and compile comprehensive digital learning portfolios for each child. These portfolios track progress against developmental milestones across all domains (cognitive, social-emotional, physical) and include samples of work and photographic evidence. We schedule regular, collaborative review meetings with parents to discuss the portfolio and jointly adjust the learning goals, ensuring full transparency and partnership in your child's journey. We are extremely keen on supporting Parent D's child and believe our methodology ensures genuine developmental growth.
